item.title: About
item.description: I'm currently a Lead Software Engineer working at Matillion in Manchester, UK where I lead a strong team of highly skilled engineers with focus on technical excellence and career progression. I'm working with Amazon Web Services, Google Cloud Platform and Microsoft Azure to architect & build efficient, scaling services. I like to think I'm an extremely passionate engineer who loves working with multiple programming languages such as Go, Java, JavaScript, Python just to name a few.
